description.value:
The alchemist expands the set of objects he can create with his constructive dyes. The alchemist can expend one additional use of his daily bombs when using his constructive dyes discovery to create objects, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.b8lt1275mz4ez4d8]{Major Creation}.

The alchemist must be at least 10th level and have the constructive dyes and divine inks discoveries before selecting this discovery.
